reviews.text: Our family of 5 spent a week here over New Years. I was a bit concerned by the negative reviews but we had no choice as we got it from a time share exchange given to us by a family member. We were pleasantly surprised when we walked into our 2/2 condo. New appliances, very spacious rooms and comfortable beds (even the couch that our younger daughter slept on.) If you're looking for a sunny ocean view- this isn't the place. If you're looking for a comfortable place to relax after a long day of sight seeing, surfing or snorkeling- this is great! The kitchen had everything we needed cook nice meals and make delicious drinks.
reviews.title: Location!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The only complaint was the noise and we were forewarned so we brought ear plugs. The roosters do get up way before dawn. As well, the walls are not sound proof. We were on the lower floor and could hear some New Years Eve partiers laughing and fighting until around 5 am upstairs. We could even hear their conversations!
reviews.title: We would stay there again
Good location-that's about it.
reviews.text: We loved Kauai, especially Hanalei Bay. Didn't mind the rain, loved it when the sun came out.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I wouldn't pay top dollar for this resort but if you can get a deal on it, it's worth it!
reviews.title: Nice Condo in Princeville
Kauai is beautiful, stay elsewhere
reviews.text: We preferred the North part of the Island by far and the condo was ideally situated to easily enjoy the town of Hanalei which is not nearly as touristy as so many other parts of Hawaii. It was delightful in that respect. There are many beaches and decent restaurants close by as well as some local shopping. There is a grocery store five minutes drive from the condo and it is the same distance to the magnificent Bali Hai Resort which has probably the best patio to eat dinner (or go for a drink) and watch the sunset anywhere on the Island. It was stunning and you must do this if you go to Kauai.
